website_summaries.verdict: A good mask for those looking for something comfortable to wear.
pros: Hollow wire construction and pads that also wick sweat away
cons: The main straps could be longer for better adjustment

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 15yo umpire
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter to wear to umpire this summer. After reading multiple reviews, this one was recommended over some of the heavier ones. It was a great purchase. It provided the protection needed, without weighing a ton and being super uncomfortable. Have recommended to others!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good mask for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good mask for the price. However the main straps are too short to allow proper fitment. It's a shame really, a couple of extra inches in strap length at the temple and this would be a great mask. As it is you need to sew an extension onto the existing adjustment strap then you'll be set.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I like this mask
customer_reviews.text: I like this mask, it is a little awkward to wear but all umpire masks can be awkward. It is adjustable and as comfortable as these things can be. The only bad thing is that the velcro sometimes gets stuck in my hair, but I think that would happen with any umpire mask that has velcro on it. I would recommend this and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Champagne

customer_reviews.title: 2nd be time around
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. They have changed the pads which i like. Very light and comfortable, I feel very protected. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great looking mask
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and new purchased as refurbished. Fits nicely and feels lightweight going to change out pads with my wilsons but pads that came with them are fine Just attached the throat guard I purchased through Amazon also. Great combination
customer_reviews.author: Damien B.

customer_reviews.title: which is nice & comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Mask is lite enough, which is nice & comfortable to wear! But the gauge of most of the metal bar's are small & will bend/dent from hard impact. Expect the cross bars above & below in front of the eye's are noticeable two bars welded together. For the price u can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: UmpRC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be lighter than other brands but is light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Keven Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Very Light Mask
customer_reviews.text: Great, light mask. Wish the bottom pads were a different material against my chin but I could replace those myself.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Hames

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight; good quality; easily adjustable straps; Would be even better if had an adjustable strap for ear-to-ear over the top, but regardless is a terrific buy.
customer_reviews.author: Webb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face guard and I might add
customer_reviews.text: Excellent face guard and I might add...add the throat guard (you'll need it). I took a few line fouls to the face this past season and this little guy did its job as expected (you'll still ring a bit but if you know ball that's to be expected). Overall this is a superb protection device.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: awesome , light and dry
customer_reviews.text: wow, this is nice. super light. and maybe the best part... when its warm out doesnt get sweaty and slippery on your face with the padding, with the "dri pads" ...love it, price is great too
customer_reviews.author: Viking fan

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this! He uses it to play catch with my son as he pitches. Very light and not bulky. My son also likes using it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: way better then outdated mask I Was using
customer_reviews.text: Very Lightweight and durable, way better then outdated mask I Was using.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Very Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very Lightweight yet has a lot of padding. Perfect mask to not strain your neck but still give a lot of protection. Been umpiring for 3yrs now (over 150 games).
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Great mask! Son uses it for umpiring and has ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mask! Son uses it for umpiring and has taken a few wild pitches in the mask and he says it works great. Highly recommend this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Walden

customer_reviews.title: Umpire Mask
customer_reviews.text: I umpire every week, and this is the best mask around. Lightweight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight mask
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father who umpires weekly baseball games. He loves it and is a lot lighter than his old mask. Also fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived fast and is just what I needed, very lightweight b\and does an perfect job! Would definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Madi's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Took a shot off the facemask and didn't feel it. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Browning

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged and exactly as described. Adjusted to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and exactly as described. Adjusted to my head, and is extremely light weight. Looking forward to using it this season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for kids too
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, fits my 10 year old jr umpire
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Umpire Mask
customer_reviews.text: loved the weight. very light. Chin pad a bit rough. Would prefer a smooth surface vs mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mask. Light weight and good visual field
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mask. Light weight and good visual field. Fast delivery.... worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Sidebottom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this mask to others. It's light and very comfrontable. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Bernard Pope

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and I received my shipment within the minimum time frame. Very happy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Troy T Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected. I have a relatively large head ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. I have a relatively large head and the way the straps for the headgear are set up im all out of adjustments and it very snug. May have to cut the buckles off and redo the straps to give em more room. Hard to explain in text.
customer_reviews.author: wesley Clark

product_meta.title: CHAMPRO Lightweight Dri-Gear Adult Baseball/Softball Umpire Mask
product_meta.description: This adult umpire mask is constructed with a lightweight frame and has synthetic Ergo-fit pads for comfort. The ear and throat extensions give you added protection behind the plate. The lightweight frame and Dri-Gear moisture wicking fabric on the pads will keep umpires more comfortable throughout the game. - 18 oz lightweight frame - Synthetic Ergo-fit pads - Dri-Gear moisture wicking fabric - Ear and throat extensions - Harness included
feature_bullets: DURABLE FRAME: Constructed with hollow wire steel, the Lightweight Umpire Mask withstands the impact of rebounding baseballs and softballs.

LIGHTWEIGHT: Hollow-wire construction creates a lightweight 18oz. frame that makes it easy to follow the action as it unfolds on the baseball or softball diamond and provides continual comfort through hours of play.

COMFORTABLE DRI-GEAR PADDING: Equipped with synthetic DRI-GEAR Ergo-Fit pads that provide maximum comfort and protection while wicking away moisture throughout the game. Attached with hook-and-loop straps for easy removal and reattachment.
EXTRA PROTECTIVE EXTENSIONS: The frame extends past the ears, throat, and forehead for additional protection of sensitive areas.
ADJUSTABLE HARNESS: Includes an adjustable harness that securely fastens the mask to a range of head sizes for comfort and protection. Easily removable for cleaning between games.

AVAILABLE IN A KIT: Trying to piece together umpire gear from here and there? Get it all in one with the CHAMPRO Varsity Umpire Kit, which includes this Lightweight Umpire Mask in addition to a chest protector, leg guards, ball bag, and accessories.
